amendment.description: To repeal the tax subsidy for certain domestic companies which move manufacturing operations and American jobs offshore.

vote.text: Amendment SA 210 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 63.

action.text: Amendment SA 210 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S2832-2833; text: CR S2832-2833) To repeal the tax subsidy for certain domestic companies which move manufacturing operations and American jobs offshore.
